sentences.en: But they do not " ionize , "'structure, " " cluster " or " magnetize " water, as various manufacturers claim.
sentences.cn: 但某些制造商宣称,洗衣球可将水 [ 离子化] 、 [ 建构] 、 [ 聚集 ] 或 [ 磁化],这就办不到了.

sentences.en: But thought alone will not completely magnetize you.
sentences.cn: 但单靠想法不会完全吸引住你.

sentences.en: His dark flashing eyes seemed to magnetize her.
sentences.cn: 他那双炯炯有神的黑眼睛好像把她给迷住了。

sentences.en: She can magnetize a theatre audience.
sentences.cn: 她能像磁石般吸引剧院观众。

sentences.en: Traditional buildings magnetize more tourists from other places and bring more consumers and opportunities.
sentences.cn: 历史建筑吸引了更多的各地游客,并且带来了更多的消费者和机遇.

sentences.en: You can magnetize a needle by rubbing it with a magnet.
sentences.cn: 你用磁铁擦针能使它磁化.

words.tran_cn: 地磁的；有磁性的；有吸引力的
磁铁；[电磁] 磁体；磁石

trans.tran_en: to make iron or steel able to pull other pieces of metal towards itself

trans.tran_cn: 使有磁性，使磁化，紧紧吸引，迷住
